query: SELECT id, matchDate, CONVERT_TZ(matchDate, '+00:00', '-03:00') as matchDate_BR FROM matches WHERE matchDate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4BVDFYYBjXPHJtC.709074b71e30 --database EvJULGQoHRNqTu98ru5T2m --execute SELECT id, matchDate, CONVERT_TZ(matchDate, '+00:00', '-03:00') as matchDate_BR FROM matches WHERE matchDate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
